text: List of National Laboratories (Japan) includes scientific research centers in Japan. These independent administrative institutions are supported by the Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS).Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS), List of National Laboratories ; retrieved 2012-2-4. The semi-governmental laboratories include : * Central Customs LaboratoryJSPS, List of Host Institutes, National Laboratories ; retrieved 2012-2-4. * Geographical Survey Institute of Japan (Geography & Crustal Dynamics Research Center) * International Medical Center of Japan * Japan Meteorological Agency, JMA * National Cancer Center * National Cardiovascular Center Research Institute. * National Center for Child Health and Development * National Center of Neurology and Psychiatry (NCNP) * National Institute for Land and Infrastructure Management * National Institute for Longevity Sciences, NCGG * National Institute for Minamata Disease (NIMD) * National Institute of Health Sciences * National Institute of Infectious Diseases * National Institute of Population and Social Security Research * National Institute of Public Health * National Research Institute of Fire and Disaster * National Research Institute of Police Science * Policy Research Institute, Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries * Research Institute, National Rehabilitation Center for Persons with Disabilities ==Related pages== * List of Independent Administrative Institutes in Japan ==References== Category:Independent Administrative Institutions of Japan Category:Japan- related lists
title: List of National Laboratories (Japan)
